hero.h1: Title Loans in Los Angeles, CA
hero.subheadline: Get Fast Cash Using Your Vehicle's Equity - Same-Day Funding Available for Los Angeles Residents

description:
Looking for fast cash in Los Angeles? Direct Title Loans offers title loans to Los Angeles residents who need quick access to funds. Whether you're dealing with an unexpected expense, medical bill, or emergency repair in this fast-paced city, we can help you leverage your vehicle's equity to get the money you need.

Our Downtown Los Angeles location at 456 South Broadway is conveniently located right across from the Bradbury Building and just down the road from Grand Central Market. If you are taking I-10 (Santa Monica Freeway), take Exit 8 for Downtown LA, or from I-5 (Golden State Freeway), use Exit 74 to reach us quickly.

With a median household income of $80,366 and median home values exceeding $878,000, Los Angeles residents understand the importance of having financial options when unexpected expenses arise. Our title loan process is simple and fast - we accept cars, trucks, motorcycles, and RVs as collateral. You keep driving your vehicle while you repay the loan, and our flexible terms work with your budget.

California law caps title loan APR at 30% for loans of $2,500 or more, providing you with strong consumer protections. All our loans are fully compliant with DFPI regulations, and we never charge prepayment penalties. Serving the greater Los Angeles area including Pasadena, Glendale, Burbank, Long Beach, and Santa Monica, Direct Title Loans is your trusted local source for vehicle-secured financing.
shortDescription: Direct Title Loans offers fast title loans in Los Angeles, CA. Use your car, truck, or motorcycle as collateral. Same-day funding, bad credit OK. California's 30% APR cap protects you. Serving Downtown LA, Hollywood, and surrounding areas.

productLinks.headline: What Vehicles Can You Use for a Loan in Los Angeles?
productLinks.intro: While most customers in Los Angeles County use their car, we accept a variety of vehicles at this branch:

stateCompliance.headline: Understanding Title Loan Laws in California
stateCompliance.content: Residents of Los Angeles benefit from California's strong consumer protection laws enforced by the Department of Financial Protection and Innovation (DFPI), one of the nation's most active consumer protection regulators. Direct Title Loans is fully licensed and compliant with all California lending regulations.
keyPoints: California caps title loan interest at 30% APR for loans of $2,500 or more
Minimum loan amount for standard title loans is $2,500
All lenders must be licensed by the DFPI - verify at dfpi.ca.gov/verify-a-license
No prepayment penalties allowed - you can pay off early at any time
Lenders must provide clear disclosure of all costs before you sign
You have the right to file complaints with DFPI at (866) 275-2677
stateCompliance.regulatoryBody: California Department of Financial Protection and Innovation (DFPI)
stateCompliance.disclaimer: This information is for general educational purposes only and may not reflect the most current legal developments. Laws and regulations change frequently. Always consult with a licensed attorney or contact the California DFPI at (866) 275-2677 or visit dfpi.ca.gov for the most accurate and up-to-date information before making any financial decisions.

localReviews.headline: What Our Los Angeles Customers Say

reviews.name: Carlos M.
reviews.text: Needed emergency cash for a medical bill and Direct Title Loans came through. Their Downtown LA location near Grand Central Market was easy to find. Got approved in under an hour and kept driving my truck the whole time.

reviews.name: Jennifer L.
reviews.text: After my AC broke in August, I was desperate. The team at Direct Title Loans explained everything clearly, including California's 30% rate cap. No hidden fees, no surprises. Paid it off early with no penalty!

reviews.name: David R.
reviews.text: Used my motorcycle for a title loan when I needed funds for my small business. The process was quick and straightforward. Staff was knowledgeable about California regulations. Would recommend.

faq.question: How do I get a title loan in Los Angeles, CA?
faq.answer: Visit our Downtown LA location at 456 South Broadway (near the Bradbury Building) or apply online. You'll need your vehicle title, valid ID, proof of income, and proof of residence. Many Los Angeles applicants are approved and funded the same day.

faq.question: What is the maximum APR for title loans in California?
faq.answer: California law caps title loan interest at 30% APR for loans of $2,500 or more. This is one of the strongest consumer protections in the nation, enforced by the California DFPI.

faq.question: What is the minimum loan amount for title loans in Los Angeles?
faq.answer: For standard title loans in California, the minimum loan amount is $2,500. This is a state regulation designed to provide clear rate structures and consumer protections.

faq.question: Can I pay off my Los Angeles title loan early?
faq.answer: Yes! California law prohibits prepayment penalties. You can pay off your title loan at any time without any additional fees, potentially saving on interest charges.

faq.question: What vehicles qualify for title loans in Los Angeles?
faq.answer: We accept cars, trucks, motorcycles, and RVs in Los Angeles. Your vehicle must have a clear title in your name, be in working condition, and have sufficient value to secure the loan.

faq.question: How do I verify that a title loan company is licensed in California?
faq.answer: You can verify any lender's California Financing Law (CFL) license at dfpi.ca.gov/verify-a-license or call the DFPI at (866) 275-2677. Direct Title Loans is fully licensed and compliant.
